title: Low FPS with GTX 1070 and i5-6600k
body:
Low fps, basically the same as my GTX 950 on the same settings (lol?) and card underclocks 600mhz on the core clock when playing LoL only.

No im not r%%%%%ed
No my computer isnt infected with some magical malware that specifically targets LoL only and causes it to lag.
Yes i do know how to use computers
Yes i do have the latest drivers, only 2 drivers currently support pascal anyway

There is literally no reason this should be happening from a hardware standpoint.

Riot fix your awful programming thanks.

replies.body:
Boost your FPS by utilising the **[Frames for days booster.](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752684-Low-Frame-Rate-FPS-Troubleshooting)** This booster is legal and is approved by Riot.


http://riot-web-static.s3.amazonaws.com/images/news/Skins/Tristana_RocketGirl_Splash.jpg

This is a good place to start, and the steps regarding power settings and running the game as admin are the more likely solutions here. If the guide provides no change to your issue, I recommend reaching out to our tech specialists by [submitting a ticket. ](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/requests/new)

To expedite this, attaching a set of logs using our [Hextech Repair Tool](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752674-Network-System-and-League-of-Legends-Logs) would help immensely. 

Let me know if you have any questions.
Is your HDMI plugged into your video card or your motherboard.

I had the same exact problem! I had just bought the new GTX 1070 with an i5-6600k, and my card started to show signs of underperformance. So after multiple tries, I figured out that Windows was holding back my system. Go into your power settings for windows, and choose the one that optimizes performance over power savings. Hope it helps. Let me know how things turn out. {{item:3751}}
